goal.ch:
本課程專為具備醫療資訊、程式設計、資料探勘等基礎知識的研究生設計，旨在培養學生利用資訊科技於醫療領域進行應用研究與系統開發的能力。課程涵蓋智慧醫療的核心技術，包括人工智慧、機器學習、自然語言處理、物聯網與雲端運算等，並探討其在臨床決策支援系統、電子病歷分析、健康管理、疾病預測與遠距醫療中的應用。學生將透過案例研究與實作專案，深入了解如何設計並實現智慧醫療系統，以解決真實醫療問題。課程目標包括：
1. 掌握智慧醫療相關的技術與應用。
2. 能夠設計並開發智慧醫療系統以解決實際問題。
3. 培養跨領域整合能力，提升醫療資訊應用研究的深度與廣度。
goal.en:
This course is tailored for students with foundational knowledge in healthcare informatics, programming, and data mining. It aims to equip students with the skills to conduct applied research and develop systems in the field of smart healthcare using cutting-edge information technologies. Key topics include artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, the Internet of Things (IoT), and cloud computing, with a focus on their applications in clinical decision support systems, electronic medical record analysis, health management, disease prediction, and telemedicine. Through case studies and hands-on projects, students will learn how to design and implement smart healthcare systems to address real-world healthcare challenges.

Course Objectives
1. Understand the core technologies and applications of smart healthcare.
2. Develop smart healthcare systems to address practical challenges.
3. Cultivate interdisciplinary integration skills to enhance the depth and breadth of research in healthcare informatics.
